content: this pattern was inspired by the beekeeper s quilt 1 by tiny owl knits 2 if you haven t seen it seriously go check it out it s amazing this is my crocheted take on her awesome knitted puffs since these are worked in the round there will be a tad bit of spiraling to them they will flatten out as you connect them enjoy making your puffs if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to ask if you make the puff in worsted the gauge will be greater than the fingering/sock weight version 4 stitches and 5 row in 1 **26 aug changed the stitch count - it makes the sides closer to the same size all the way around ** please update your pattern to the newest version o 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/the-beekeepers-quilt 2 http //www ravelry com/people/tinyowlknits
